item.title: What Trump has done since taking power
item.description: The Republican has started his second term at a fast pace. Here's a handy guide to waht he's done so far.

item.title: Children among dead as Turkey hotel fire investigation continues
item.description: At least 76 people are known to have died, including children and multiple family members.

item.title: Election of taoiseach delayed as dáil suspended amid disorder
item.description: A row broke out in the dáil, forcing the suspension of proceedings as the Irish parliament returned to nominate a new taoiseach.

item.title: What led to hotel fire disaster at Turkish ski resort?
item.description: Some survivors did not hear a fire alarm and there are claims of failures in the hotel's fire safety.

item.title: India court orders seizure of 'offensive' MF Husain paintings
item.description: A complaint claimed that paintings of two Hindu deities at an art gallery "hurt religious sentiments".
